original_title: Man shoots himself after shooting woman in Vavuniya
original_body_lines: Police have launched investigations after a 24-year-old man shot himself dead after killing a 26-year-old woman at Niliamottei in Parayanalakulam, Vavuniya early this morning.
Police said the 119 emergency hotline received a call that a woman has been shot dead in a house and the suspect had also committed suicide.
Police said both the victim and the suspect were identified as residents of the Nilaimottei area.
Investigations revealed that the deceased is a married woman and resides in Niliamottei with her husband and child and the suspect had shot her at the house due to a dispute.
She reportedly had an affair with the suspect before her marriage.
